description: soil depth where 100 = sensor at 100-120cm; 50 = sensor at 50-70 cm; 10 = sensor at 0-20cm

methodNotes: Sensors are located at the 'mid-radius point inside each of the plots; with 3 sensors per plot (across 3 depths); Data collection is generally measurement per 30 minutes (may vary due to power cuts; modifications to protocol); data in this file are for the first two years of soil heating
